Description.enUS: Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and vespene gas. Can mutate into structures.**Can attack ground units**
Description.zhCN:
基础工作单位。用于采集晶体矿和高能瓦斯。可以变异为建筑。

可以对地。
Description.koKR:
기본 일꾼 유닛입니다. 미네랄과 베스핀 가스를 채취할 수 있습니다. 구조물로 변이할 수 있습니다.

지상 유닛 공격 가능

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.ruRU: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of basic structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: A list of basic structures.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of advanced structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: A list of advanced structures.

Tooltip.enUS: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.
Tooltip.ruRU: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the unit to the surface.
Tooltip.ruRU: Returns the unit to the surface.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the unit to the surface.
Tooltip.ruRU: Returns the unit to the surface.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the unit to the surface.
Tooltip.ruRU: Returns the unit to the surface.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the unit to the surface.
Tooltip.ruRU: Returns the unit to the surface.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the unit to the surface.
Tooltip.ruRU: Returns the unit to the surface.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the unit to the surface.
Tooltip.ruRU: Returns the unit to the surface.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS:
Primary structure. Used to spawn all Zerg units and receive gathered resources. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures. Can mutate into a Lair.

Enables:
- Drone
Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑，能够孵化所有异虫单位并接收采集到的资源。可以生成菌毯，满足附近异虫建筑的存活需求。可以进化为Lair。

开启：
- Drone
Tooltip.koKR:
주 건물입니다. 저그 유닛을 생성하고 채취한 자원을 수집합니다. 크립을 생성하여 주위 저그 구조물에 양분을 공급합니다. Lair로 변이할 수 있습니다.

사용 가능:
- Drone

Tooltip.enUS: Creep generator structure. Can mutate into Sunken Colony or Spore Colony. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures.
Tooltip.zhCN: 菌毯生成设施。可以变异为Sunken Colony或Spore Colony。菌毯能够为附近的异虫建筑提供给养。
Tooltip.koKR: 크립 생성 구조물입니다. Sunken Colony나 Spore Colony로 변이 가능합니다. 크립은 주변 저그 구조물에 양분을 공급합니다.

Tooltip.enUS: Mutated over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
Tooltip.zhCN: 变异于Vespene Geyser上，用于采集高能瓦斯。
Tooltip.koKR: 베스핀 가스 채취를 위해 Vespene Geyser 위에 건설하는 구조물입니다.

Tooltip.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Zerglings.

Enables:
- Zerglings from Larvae
- Sunken Colony from Creep Colony
Tooltip.zhCN:
为Zergling提供升级方案。

开启：
- Larva可以变异为Zergling
- Creep Colony可以变异为Sunken Colony
Tooltip.koKR:
Zergling을 업그레이드합니다.

사용 가능:
- Zergling (Larva에서 변태)
- Sunken Colony (Creep Colony에서 변이)

Tooltip.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Zerg ground units.

Enables:
- Spore Colony from Creep Colony
Tooltip.zhCN:
为异虫地面单位提供升级方案。

开启：
- Creep Colony可以变异为Spore Colony
Tooltip.koKR:
저그 지상 유닛을 업그레이드합니다.

사용 가능:
- Spore Colony (Creep Colony에서 변이)

Tooltip.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Hydralisks

Enables:
- Hydralisk from Larvae
Tooltip.zhCN:
为Hydralisk提供升级方案。

开启：
- Larva可以变异为Hydralisk
Tooltip.koKR:
Hydralisk를 업그레이드합니다.

사용 가능:
- Hydralisk (Larva에서 변태)

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Zerg air units. Can mutate into a Greater Spire.

Enables:
- Mutalisks from Larvae
Tooltip.zhCN:
为异虫飞行生物提供进化方案。可以变异为Greater Spire。

开启：
- Larva可以变异为Mutalisk
Tooltip.koKR:
저그 공중 유닛을 업그레이드합니다. Greater Spire으로 변이할 수 있습니다.

사용 가능:
- Mutalisk (Larva에서 변태)

Tooltip.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Queens

Enables:
- Queens from Larvae
Tooltip.zhCN:
为Queen提供升级方案。

开启：
- Larva可以变异为Queen
Tooltip.koKR:
Queen을 업그레이드 합니다.

사용 가능:
- Queen (Larva에서 변태)

Tooltip.enUS: Friendly ground units can use the Nydus Canal to instantly travel to the other end of the Nydus Canal owned by the player.
Tooltip.zhCN: 友方地面单位可借助Nydus Canal在任何玩家拥有的Nydus Canal间穿梭。
Tooltip.koKR: 아군 지상 유닛은 Nydus Canal을 이용하여 플레이어가 소유한 다른 끝의 Nydus Canal로 즉시 이동할 수 있습니다.

Tooltip.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Defilers.

Enables:
- Defilers from Larvae
Tooltip.zhCN:
为Defiler提供升级方案。

开启：
- Larva可以变异为Defiler
Tooltip.koKR:
Defiler를 업그레이드합니다.

사용 가능:
- Defiler (Larva에서 변태)

Tooltip.enUS:
Contains upgrades for Ultralisks.

Enables:
- Ultralisks from Larvae
Tooltip.zhCN:
为Ultralisk提供升级方案。

开启：
- Larva可以变异为Ultralisk
Tooltip.koKR:
Ultralisk를 업그레이드합니다.

사용 가능:
- Ultralisk (Larva에서 변태)
